analysis.key_info: Official court document granting authority to a personal representative to administer the estate of Dennis W. Rogan.
analysis.naming_rationale: The filename adheres strictly to the provided legal industry standard: `[DocumentType]_[Parties]_[Matter/CaseID]_[Date]`. It clearly identifies the document as 'Domiciliary Letters', specifies the deceased's estate ('Rogan_Dennis_W_Estate'), includes the crucial court case number ('24-PR-371'), and provides the issuance date in ISO format ('2024-11-19'). The chosen name is concise (67 characters), uses underscores for spaces and hyphens for compound identifiers, making it immediately clear and scannable. The provided current filename is already an excellent example of an industry-standard, intuitive name for this document type, requiring no substantive changes.
